name: Chiroform Posture Band
descr:
Chiroform Posture Band
 
Your body has an incredible capacity to regulate and heal itself. So, the good news is that any postural damage you may have done through bad habits or a modern lifestyle, can probably still be corrected.
Take an active role in improving your posture by spending just a few minutes a day to stretch, strengthen and proper posture.

With Chiroform Posture Band, you can improve your posture and hence:

• Reduce pain in your back and neck
• Increase blood flow to and from the heart
• Reduce blood pressure and increase circulation
• Improve breathing and diaphragm function
• Open throat and windpipe
• Reduce stress on lower and upper back
• Increase range of motion
• Improve nerve signals from the spine
• Reduce fatigue and positively impact sleep
• Promote proper growth development in children
• Reduce the likelihood of spinal conditions such as herniated discs
• Reduce pressure to kidneys, stomach, colon & other internal organs
• Improve cerebrospinal (brain stem) fluid flow
• Reduce dizziness, headaches and "pins & needles”
• Reduce the risk of osteoarthritis and other types of joint damage
 
Stretch - Strength - Posture correction
 
In addition, the Chiroform Posture Band can also be used as a training tool, so that without the use of other tools, you can strengthen the musculoskeletal system through stretch, strength and stability exercises.

Everybody Needs One

• Immediate results
• Most ages & abilities
• Use & wear anywhere
• Use for rehab or pre-hab
• Five sizes
 
Choice of materials 
 
TPE / TPR
Thermoplastic rubber or thermoplastic elastomers are a new material with silicone-like grades. The main ingredient of the production of elastomers is natural or synthetic rubber, which is then combined with the functional capacity of synthetic material. This skin-like material delivers a very natural feeling and gives an excellent sensation.

The main benefits:

• Odorless
• Without plasticizers (phthalates)
• Excellent elasticity and consistency
• UV resistance
• Skin friendliness
• Quickly adjusts to body temperature
• Environmentally friendly

Note: TPE / TPR requires a talcum powder for regular care.
